resources.string: Installing voice data on SD card.

The voice data has been installed successfully on your SD card. You can now uninstall this installer to save space in your phone memory; the voice data from this installer will safely remain on your SD card.

The voice data could not be installed on your SD card. Please make sure your SD card is inserted in your device and that there is at least 6 MB of free space on that card. If your card is already in your device, please try removing the card and reinserting it.
